title: Cuisinart Single Serve Brewing System Commercial
description: Perfect for both personal use and entertaining, this single-serve home-brewing system offers consumers fresh gourmet coffee, tea, hot cocoa and more in under one minute. Using Keurig K-Cups®—featuring over two hundred varieties of pre-measured, premium brand coffee and tea—this brewer's innovative one-touch technology makes it easier than ever for consumers to enjoy a wide array of hot beverages.

asset.author: CuisinartVideo
asset.hookText: Perfect for both personal use and entertaining, this single-serve home-brewing system offers consumers fresh gourmet coffee, tea, hot cocoa and more in under one minute. Using Keurig K-Cups®—featuring over two hundred varieties of pre-measured, premium brand coffee and tea—this brewer's innovative one-touch technology makes it easier than ever for consumers to enjoy a wide array of hot beverages. See more at http://www.cuisinart.com/products/coffee_bar/ss-700.html

transcripts: What's your type? French train and tense, great body sweet and hot or cool. With Cuisinart's single serve. In less than a minute you get an endless variety of beverages in five cup sizes and brew temperatures plus a generous 80 ounce reservoir with water filter for plenty of hot cocoa. A quick rinse some steamy oatmeal. And even brew your own custom blend our single serve brewing system gives you more choices tailored to your taste than a coffee bar.
